job_description:
Our team has an immediate permanent opening for a Senior Software Engineer.

Responsibilities:

Insights and tracking of the current web runtime technologies (Web engine/JavaScript engine) development, evolution and technical design
Participate in the design and development of the next generation web engine, and the formulation of relevant standards
Participate in the end-to-end design and implementation of web engine to achieve a leading architecture with high performance, low resource consumption, and flexibility

Job requirements

What you'll bring to the team:

Familiar with web OS or web kernel development
Proficient in one of the following languages: C++, C, JavaScript, Java
Have outstanding coding and engineering realization ability
Experienced in architecture of framework, like Angular, React, Vue is an asset
Familar with Blink/Webkit, web layout, web rendering, JavaScript engine, WebAssembly, PWA (progressive web app) and web security is an asset
Solid understanding with Android or iOS is an asset
